strings.Value: "Let her sing whatever she likes. It's none of my concern."

"Your Grace, forgive my intrusion! We have a matter that demands your urgent attention. Right now, Annamede Belavarah, the bard from {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}, is singing in the middle of our main square. And her songs are… seditious, to say the least."

"{mf|Baron|Baroness}, you must intervene immediately! Annamede Belavarah, one of King Irovetti's… favored artists... is singing in tour main square right now. Her songs are far from innocent, they can plant dangerous ideas in your subjects' heads."

"{mf|Baron|Baroness}, we have a situation on our hands! You need to act!" {n}Lander is furious, his face red.{/n} "Annamede, an annoying little skylark from {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}, is giving a show in the main square, and her songs are highly seditious!"
"She's among the most talented bards of {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}. But more importantly, she's one of King Irovetti's most favored singers. Anything she sings almost certainly promotes his agenda."
